column9:
I am currently on annual leave from 12 September 2011 returning on Monday 26th September 2011.
Should you require help with conference enquiries please contact our Function Co-ordinator. Georgia Cameron-Hill at amfunctions@countryclubs.com.au.
Our Office Manager Karen Kotz may be of assistance with general enquiries at fos@adelaidemeridien.com.au. 

I will answer all non urgent emails as soon as possible after my return.

Regards.

Fiona Hehir
